name: A long way through a pastel universe
name_original: A long way through a pastel universe
description:
Specially made for TwitsyBot Jam and Emma! 

Inspired by @deepsushibot by Kate Compton and @FermiPasteladox by William Anderson 

Made with Bitsy, Borksy, and a lot, really a lot of help from the Bitsy Discord.

Background noise made with Bosca Ceoil
